trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selecting"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 데이터를 제공는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selecting"> </xref> 의 이벤트는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: By adding an event handler delegate to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selecting> event, you can perform any additional preprocessing required or cancel the database query entirely.
trans-unit.target: 처리 하는 이벤트 처리기 대리자를 추가 하 여는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selecting>이벤트에 필요한 추가 전처리 수행 하거나 완전히 데이터베이스 쿼리를 취소할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selecting>

trans-unit.source: Because the SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs class is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs> class, you can cancel a pending <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> database query by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs 클래스에서 파생 되기 때문에 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs>취소할 수 클래스는 보류 중인 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>설정 하 여 데이터베이스 쿼리는 <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>속성을 `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: You can examine and manipulate the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandText%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.Parameters%2A> collection, and other database query properties prior to running the query by accessing the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> object exposed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs.Command%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 검토 하 고 조작할 수는 <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandText%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.Parameters%2A>컬렉션 및 다른 데이터베이스 쿼리 속성에 액세스 하 여 쿼리를 실행 하기 전에 <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand>에 의해 노출 되는 개체는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs.Command%2A>속성.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs.Command%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.Parameters%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandText%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also examine the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> object that is passed to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A> method by accessing the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs.Arguments%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 검사할 수도 있습니다는 <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>에 전달 되는 개체는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A>에 액세스 하 여 메서드는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs.Arguments%2A>속성.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs.Arguments%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>

trans-unit.source: The SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs class is used in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnSelecting%2A> method to provide access to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> database query before it is run.
trans-unit.target: SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs 클래스에서 사용 되는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnSelecting%2A>에 대 한 액세스를 제공 하는 메서드는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>데이터베이스 쿼리를 실행 하기 전에.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnSelecting%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control exposes many events that you can handle to work with the underlying data objects during the course of a data operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>컨트롤 데이터 작업을 사용 하는 동안 기본 데이터 개체를 사용 하기 위해 처리할 수 있는 많은 이벤트를 노출 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the events and associated <xref:System.EventArgs> classes and event handler delegates.
trans-unit.target: 다음 표에서 이벤트를 나열 및 관련 <xref:System.EventArgs>클래스와 이벤트 처리기 대리자.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: |Event|EventArgs|EventHandler| |-----------|---------------|------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selecting>.
trans-unit.target: | 이벤트 | EventArgs | 이벤트 처리기 | |-----------|---------------|------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selecting>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selecting>

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the data is retrieved.|SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserting>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updating>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleting>.
trans-unit.target: 데이터를 검색 하기 전에 발생 합니다. | SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserting>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updating>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleting>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleting></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updating></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserting></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: Occur before an insert, update, or delete operation is performed.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selected>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserted>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updated>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleted>.
trans-unit.target: 업데이트 또는 삭제 작업이 수행 되는 삽입 하기 전에 발생 합니다. | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selected>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserted>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updated>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleted>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleted></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updated></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserted></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selected></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occur after the data retrieval, insert, update, or delete operation completes.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventHandler>|
trans-unit.target: 삽입, 업데이트 또는 삭제 작업이 완료 되는 데이터 검색 후에 발생 합니다. | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventHandler>|</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs"></xref> class, using the specified <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref> object and any <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> passed to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*> method.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs"> </xref> 클래스를 사용 하 여 지정 된 <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"> </xref> 개체와 <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"> </xref> 에 전달 되는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*>메서드.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*>

trans-unit.source: The `inputParameters` parameter is an <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> collection of name/value pairs that match those in the method signature and are passed by reference.
trans-unit.target: `inputParameters` 매개 변수는 한 <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>메서드 시그니처가 일치 및 참조로 전달 하는 이름/값 쌍의 컬렉션입니다.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref> object that represents the cancelable <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*> query.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"> </xref> 나타내는 취소할 수 있는 개체 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*>쿼리.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> object passed to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"> </xref> 에 전달 된 개체는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*>메서드.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> object passed to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*> method.
trans-unit.target: 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"> </xref> 에 전달 된 개체는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*>메서드.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*>

trans-unit.source: You can examine the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> object to determine whether sorting, paging, or a row count are requested as part of the data retrieval operation.
trans-unit.target: 검사할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>정렬, 페이징 여부를 확인 하려면 개체 또는 데이터 검색 작업의 일부로 행 수를 요청 했습니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>

trans-unit.source: Data-bound controls use the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> class to request that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> perform additional data-related operations on a result set, such as sorting the data or returning a specific subset of data.
trans-unit.target: 데이터 바인딩된 컨트롤을 사용 하는 <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>를 요청 하는 클래스는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>는 결과 집합 데이터를 정렬 하거나 데이터의 특정 하위 집합을 반환 하는 등 추가 데이터 관련 작업을 수행 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>

trans-unit.source: These data-related operations are enumerated by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 이러한 데이터 관련 작업으로 열거 되 고 <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities>열거형.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>.
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> 을 참조 하십시오.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> object, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> object is specified during <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs"></xref> creation.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"> </xref> 개체 또는 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> 없으면 <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"> </xref> 개체를 지정 하는 동안 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs"> </xref> 생성 합니다.
